titleStmt.title: An exact narrative of the attempts made upon the Duke of Glocester. Being the extract of divers letters written out of France to persons of quality in England. And published for the satisfaction of all true Protestants.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are sold by F. Eglesfield, at the Marygold in S. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "December 16"; the final '5' in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Marygold in S. Pauls Church-yard.
